openpiv_cxx.preprocess.highpass_filter¶

openpiv_cxx.preprocess.highpass_filter(img: ndarray, kernel_size: int = 3, sigma: float = 1.0, clip_at_zero: bool = True) → ndarray¶

A simple sliding window gaussian high pass filter.

Parameters:

  • img (ndarray) – A two dimensional array containing pixel intenensities.

  • kernel_size (int) – nxn size of the convolution kernel.

  • sigma (float) – Sigma of nxn gaussian convolution kernel.

Returns:

new_img – A two dimensional array containing pixel intenensities.

Return type:

ndarray
